statement.select: select passwd from player where name=?;
statement.get_rule: select luafile from rule where rulename=?;
statement.get_role_ver: select luafile from role_ver where rolename=? AND vername=?
statement.get_role: select luafile from role where rolename=?
statement.get_base_room: select room_name from room where type=0
statement.get_extra_room: select room_name from room where type=1
statement.get_room_size: select sum(count) from room_contain where room_name=?
statement.get_score: select score from score where name=? AND room_name=?
statement.get_room_role: select rolename,count from room_contain where room_name=?
statement.get_room_rule: select luafile from room INNER JOIN rule ON room.rulename=rule.rulename where room_name=?
statement.update_score: update score set score=? where name=? AND room_name=?
